languages.text: "Изнеженная жизнь губит. Испытания — закаляют. Вени'Кассии стоит восхвалить Неумирающего за выпавшие на ее долю страдания".
"A coddled life leads to nothing but ruin. Trials are what hardens the spirit. Veni'Cassia should offer thanks to the Undying One for the suffering she has endured."
languages.original_text: "Изнеженная жизнь губит. Испытания — закаляют. Вени'Кассии стоит восхвалить Неумирающего за выпавшие на ее долю страдания".

traits.locale_text: "A coddled life leads to nothing but ruin. Trials are what hardens the spirit. Veni'Cassia should offer thanks to the Undying One for the suffering she has endured."
"A coddled life leads to nothing but ruin. Trials are what hardens the spirit. Veni'Cassia should offer thanks to the Undying One for the suffering she has endured."
"A coddled life leads to nothing but ruin. Trials are what hardens the spirit. Veni'Cassia should offer thanks to the Undying One for the suffering she has endured."
"A coddled life leads to nothing but ruin. Trials are what hardens the spirit. Veni'Cassia should offer thanks to the Undying One for the suffering she has endured."
"A coddled life leads to nothing but ruin. Trials are what hardens the spirit. Veni'Cassia should offer thanks to the Undying One for the suffering she has endured."

languages.text: "Ein verhätscheltes Leben führt nur zum Ruin. Prüfungen härten den Geist. Veni'Cassia sollte sich beim Todlosen für das Leid bedanken, dass sie erlitten hat."
languages.original_text: "A coddled life leads to nothing but ruin. Trials are what hardens the spirit. Veni'Cassia should offer thanks to the Undying One for the suffering she has endured."

traits.locale_text: "Ein verhätscheltes Leben führt nur zum Ruin. Prüfungen härten den Geist. Veni'Cassia sollte sich beim Todlosen für das Leid bedanken, dass sie erlitten hat."

languages.text: « Une existence surprotégée ne mène à rien si ce n'est à la ruine. Seule l'adversité endurcit l'esprit. Veni'Cassia devrait remercier l'Immortel pour les épreuves qu'elle a traversées. »
languages.original_text: "A coddled life leads to nothing but ruin. Trials are what hardens the spirit. Veni'Cassia should offer thanks to the Undying One for the suffering she has endured."

traits.locale_text: « Une existence surprotégée ne mène à rien si ce n'est à la ruine. Seule l'adversité endurcit l'esprit. Veni'Cassia devrait remercier l'Immortel pour les épreuves qu'elle a traversées. »

languages.text: «Una vida mimada solo conduce a la ruina. Las pruebas son lo que endurece el espíritu. Veni'Cassia debería dar gracias al Inmortal por el sufrimiento que ha vivido».
languages.original_text: "A coddled life leads to nothing but ruin. Trials are what hardens the spirit. Veni'Cassia should offer thanks to the Undying One for the suffering she has endured."

traits.locale_text: «Una vida mimada solo conduce a la ruina. Las pruebas son lo que endurece el espíritu. Veni'Cassia debería dar gracias al Inmortal por el sufrimiento que ha vivido».

languages.text: 「甘えた人生は破滅しかもたらさない。試練は精神を硬化させる。カシアは苦難に耐えたことを不死の者に感謝すべきよ」
languages.original_text: "A coddled life leads to nothing but ruin. Trials are what hardens the spirit. Veni'Cassia should offer thanks to the Undying One for the suffering she has endured."

traits.locale_text: 「甘えた人生は破滅しかもたらさない。試練は精神を硬化させる。カシアは苦難に耐えたことを不死の者に感謝すべきよ」

languages.text: “被宠溺的人生只能带来灭亡，而考验却能锻炼人的精神。帷者卡西娅应当感谢不死之神，感谢祂赐予她当下的痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "A coddled life leads to nothing but ruin. Trials are what hardens the spirit. Veni'Cassia should offer thanks to the Undying One for the suffering she has endured."

traits.locale_text: “被宠溺的人生只能带来灭亡，而考验却能锻炼人的精神。帷者卡西娅应当感谢不死之神，感谢祂赐予她当下的痛苦。”

languages.original_text: "A coddled life leads to nothing but ruin. Trials are what hardens the spirit. Veni'Cassia should offer thanks to the Undying One for the suffering she has endured."

languages.text: "Pohpohlanmayla dolu bir hayat, felaketten başka bir şey getirmez. Ruhu sertleştiren imtihanlardır. Veni'Cassia, çektiği tüm o acılardan dolayı Ölmeyen'e şükürlerini sunmalıdır."
languages.original_text: "A coddled life leads to nothing but ruin. Trials are what hardens the spirit. Veni'Cassia should offer thanks to the Undying One for the suffering she has endured."
